title: [Bug]: flashing border with version 1.13.2
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

The application border is flashing and zooming the content below. The shadow doesn't move with the window.

### What package are you using?

flatpak

### Version

1.13.2

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. install 1.13.2 flatpak on a Wayland desktop
2. open the application
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown

```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'

The bug is still present
```

### Additional context

downgrading fixes the problem, but the app couldn't be resized:

```
sudo flatpak update --commit=9af799ebbed5bbba8f20ebc78f3189f4b91bd2831b0cf549ffd7b84cb4c5a3b6 com.github.IsmaelMartinez.teams_for_linux
```
